languages.text: "Я — Таддуа Кровавые Руки. Палач в пятом колене и скромный послушник этого железного святого, Звездное Сиятельство".

traits.locale_text: "Я Урсус Кровавые Руки. Палач в пятом колене и скромный послушник этого железного святого, Ваше Звездное Сиятельство".

languages.text: "I am Taddua the Scorched, a slaughterman of the fifth generation, and a humble disciple of the iron saint you see before you, Your Celestial Highness."
languages.original_text: "Я — Таддуа Кровавые Руки. Палач в пятом колене и скромный послушник этого железного святого, Звездное Сиятельство".

traits.locale_text: "I am Ursus Bloodhands, A slaughterman in the fifth generation and a humble disciple of the iron saint before you, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}"
"I am Ursus Bloodhands, A slaughterman in the fifth generation and a humble disciple of the iron saint before you, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}"
"I am Ursus Bloodhands, a slaughterman of the fifth generation, and a humble disciple of the iron saint you see before you, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}"
"I am Ursus Bloodhands, a slaughterman of the fifth generation, and a humble disciple of the iron saint you see before you, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}"
"I am Taddua the Scorched, a slaughterman of the fifth generation, and a humble disciple of the iron saint you see before you, Your Celestial Highness."
"I am Taddua the Scorched, a slaughterman of the fifth generation, and a humble disciple of the iron saint you see before you, Your Celestial Highness."
"I am Taddua the Scorched, a slaughterman of the fifth generation, and a humble disciple of the iron saint you see before you, Your Celestial Highness."

languages.text: “我是‘被灼之人’塔杜亚，第五代刽子手，也是您面前这位钢铁圣人谦卑的学徒，来自上界的大人。”
languages.original_text: "I am Taddua the Scorched, a slaughterman of the fifth generation, and a humble disciple of the iron saint you see before you, Your Celestial Highness."

traits.locale_text: “我是‘被灼之人’塔杜亚，第五代刽子手，也是您面前这位钢铁圣人谦卑的学徒，来自上界的大人。”
“我是乌苏斯·血手，第五代刽子手，也是您面前这位钢铁圣人谦卑的学徒，来自上界的大人。”

languages.text: «Soy Taddua el Calcinado, matarife de quinta generación y humilde discípulo del santo de hierro que tiene ante usted, Excelencia Celestial».
languages.original_text: "I am Taddua the Scorched, a slaughterman of the fifth generation, and a humble disciple of the iron saint you see before you, Your Celestial Highness."

traits.locale_text: «Soy Taddua el Calcinado, matarife de quinta generación y humilde discípulo del santo de hierro que tiene ante usted, Excelencia Celestial».
«Soy Ursus Manosrojas, matarife de quinta generación y humilde discípulo del santo de hierro que tiene ante usted, Excelencia Celestial».

languages.text: "Ben beşinci nesil cellat Dağlayıcı Taddua. Önünüzde gördüğünüz demir azizin naçizane bir müridiyim Semavi Efendimiz."
languages.original_text: "I am Taddua the Scorched, a slaughterman of the fifth generation, and a humble disciple of the iron saint you see before you, Your Celestial Highness."

traits.locale_text: "Ben beşinci nesil cellat Dağlayıcı Taddua. Önünüzde gördüğünüz demir azizin naçizane bir müridiyim Semavi Efendimiz."
"Ben beşinci nesil cellat Ursus Bloodhands. Önünüzde gördüğünüz demir azizin naçizane bir müridiyim Semavi Efendimiz."

languages.text: 「天の閣下、私は、 焼かれし者タッドゥア、5代目の死刑執行人で、あなたの前に見えている鉄の聖者のしがない門弟の一人です」
languages.original_text: "I am Taddua the Scorched, a slaughterman of the fifth generation, and a humble disciple of the iron saint you see before you, Your Celestial Highness."

traits.locale_text: 「天の閣下、私は、アーサス・ブラッドハンズ、5代目の死刑執行人で、あなたの前に見えている鉄の聖者のしがない門弟の一人です」
「天の閣下、私は、アーサス・ブラッドハンズ、5代目の死刑執行人で、あなたの前に見えている鉄の聖者のしがない門弟の一人です」

languages.text: « Taddua le Brûlé, pour vous servir. Bourreau de la cinquième génération et humble disciple du saint de fer que vous avez sous les yeux, Votre Altesse Célestissime. »
languages.original_text: "I am Taddua the Scorched, a slaughterman of the fifth generation, and a humble disciple of the iron saint you see before you, Your Celestial Highness."

traits.locale_text: « Taddua le Brûlé, pour vous servir. Bourreau de la cinquième génération et humble disciple du saint de fer que vous avez sous les yeux, Votre Altesse Célestissime. »
« Ursus Mains-Sanglantes, pour vous servir. Bourreau de la cinquième génération et humble disciple du saint de fer que vous avez sous les yeux, Votre Altesse Célestissime. »

languages.text: "Ich bin Taddua der Verbrannte, Schlächter in fünfter Generation und demütiger Jünger des eisernen Heiligen, den Ihr vor Euch seht, Eure himmlische Hoheit."
languages.original_text: "I am Taddua the Scorched, a slaughterman of the fifth generation, and a humble disciple of the iron saint you see before you, Your Celestial Highness."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin Taddua der Verbrannte, Schlächter in fünfter Generation und demütiger Jünger des eisernen Heiligen, den Ihr vor Euch seht, Eure himmlische Hoheit."
"Ich bin Ursus Bluthand, Schlächter in fünfter Generation und demütiger Jünger des eisernen Heiligen, den Ihr vor Euch seht, Eure himmlische Hoheit."
